title: Sneaker Talk: Nick DePaula
description: ESPN's resident sneaker head Nick DePaula goes one-on-one with Cari Champion to talk about the NBA's top sneaker free agents and give us his reviews of some of the top sneakers on the market.
itunes:title: Sneaker Talk: Nick DePaula
itunes:author: ESPN, ESPNW, Cari Champion
